content: That's great to know! I'll definitely check out some of those resources. I've actually been thinking of visiting an antique shop in my neighborhood that I've been meaning to check out. The owner, Henry, seems really knowledgeable about antiques, and I've heard he's particularly fond of vintage furniture. Maybe he'll be able to give me some tips on how to care for my Remington Noiseless Portable or even help me find some other vintage typewriters to add to my collection.
